summary: A Very Simple Mod That Removes Base Spells From Your Player
descriptionHtml:
Removes The Base Spells \"Fire & Healing\" From Your Character. This spell doesn\'t require you to start over you can apply this spell at any point in the game and it will work. And I\'v insured that this spell does not interfere with learning new spells. I Made this mod for people like me who the begging spell bother or people who like a bit more of a challenge when making a new character or even for those people who just don\'t like using magic. BE WARNED: This Mod Is Only Active As Long As You Have It Running If You Uninstall It The Base Magic Spells Will Return

*************Installation**************************
Place in Folder C:/Program File (86)/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data
author: Konyo95
